Update Firmware on Blades

  1. Blade Firmware Download URL
  • Copy firmware from repository on taitc118 to the blade
    • JS22
      sudo rsync -avv /prod/images/Microcode/Blade_Center/Blade_Bios/JS22/latest/ <servername>:/tmp/firmware/
    • PS700
      sudo rsync -avv /prod/images/Microcode/Blade_Center/Blade_Bios/PS700/latest/ <servername>:/tmp/firmware/
  • On the server find out the firmware filename
    sudo ls -ld /tmp/firmware/*.img

    Make a note of the filename

  • To Upgrade Firmware on Blades running VIOS logon as padmin.
    ldfware -file /tmp/firmware/<filename>
  • To upgrade firmware on non VIOS Blades
    sudo /usr/lpp/diagnostics/bin/update_flash -f /tmp/firmware/<filename>
  • Follow the system prompts to continue and complete the firmware installation
  • Cleanup the temporary files
    sudo rm -rf /tmp/firmware
